refsection.title: Description
refsection.programlisting: select expr, case expr1 then instructions1, case expr2 then instructions2, ... case exprn then instructionsn, [else instructions], end

listitem.para: The only constraint is that each "then" keyword must be on the same line line as corresponding "case" keyword.
The keyword "then" can be replaced by a carriage return or a comma. instructions1 are executed if expr1=expr, etc.

refsection.para: Warning: the number of characters used to define the body of any conditionnal instruction (if while for or select/case) must be limited to 16k.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: while %t do n=round(10*rand(1,1)) select n case 0 then disp(0) case 1 then disp(1) else break end end
